name: Rounak Kedia
position: CFA Level III candidate | ESG Risk Analyst | Morningstar Sustainalytics | IndusInd Bank
about: A research analyst and a CFA level III candidate with a deep focus on both finance and sustainability, ESG issues, looking towards making a mark in the responsible/impact investing field.

current_company.name: HSBC
current_company.title: CFA Level III candidate | ESG Risk Analyst | Morningstar Sustainalytics | IndusInd Bank

experience.title: Associate Manager - Sustainable Banking
experience.description: 1) Assessing qualitative and quantitative ESG risks of the credit proposals of high risk companies based on the internal framework before sanctioning.2) Monitoring of the portfolio of the company on monthly basis.3) Handling of the ESG compliance of the Bank.4) Co-ordinating with internal and external stakeholders for ad-hoc operations as and when required.
experience.description_html: 1) Assessing qualitative and quantitative ESG risks of the credit proposals of high risk companies based on the internal framework before sanctioning.2) Monitoring of the portfolio of the company on monthly basis.3) Handling of the ESG compliance of the Bank.4) Co-ordinating with internal and external stakeholders for ad-hoc operations as and when required. <!---->

experience.title: ESG Research Associate
experience.description: Appraising sources of core financial metrics on sustainability issues based on EU Taxonomy solution - a guideline set by EU commission (comparable to SASB, GRI, TCFD), being used by companies to make investment decisions and to comply with the regulatory hurdles.
